episodes.title: An ATI Mother Speaks Out
episodes.description:
It's not often that we hear from the parents of ATI and the Shiny Happy People cult of Bill Gothard. In this interview, Raewyn, a mother of 10 children from New Zealand talks about what drew their family to Bill Gothard's home-schooling curriculum and the impact it had on all of them.

You can find Raewyn here: www.mybigballofstring.com

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more conversations with survivors and exerts Across the Cultiverse.

episodes.title: Dr John Cornish talks about Recovering Grace
episodes.description:
In this episode, I sit down with Dr. John Cornish, one of the original voices behind Recovering Grace, the landmark website that gave countless ATI/IBLP/Bill Gothard survivors a place to share their stories and find community.

As part of the admin team at Recovering Grace, John played a pivotal role in bringing public awareness to the damage caused by Bill Gothard’s teachings. In our conversation, he reflects on his own journey, the history of the site, and the turning points that helped shift the narrative for so many of us who grew up inside the system.

This is an honest and insightful look at how one grassroots project helped spark a wider movement of survivor voices.

👉 Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more conversations with survivors and experts Across the Cultiverse.

www.recoveringgrace.org
My Story on Recovering Grace:  Sacred Grooming

episodes.title: Anke Richter: World-leading journalist on Cults
episodes.description:
Anke Richter is a world-leading, award-winning journalist on cults and founder of DeCult, the International organisation that raises awareness about the harm caused by high-control groups. Anke talks with Rachel Lees about her journey to investigate and research cults and write the very personal stories of those she met. We discuss how not to start a cult and the important ongoing work of DeCult.

Follow Anke on social media:
Anke Richter IG - @ankerichterwriter
Facebook - Anke Richter Writer
DeCult IG - decult_nz
DeCult FB - Decult
